waste_stream.description: Off-spec and post-industrial plastic pellets from polyolefin production. Clean material suitable for recycled plastic manufacturing.
Slag from electric arc furnace steel production. Contains valuable minerals suitable for construction aggregate and cement production.
High-carbon byproduct from oil refining coking process. Suitable for fuel in cement kilns, power generation, or activated carbon production.
Calcium carbonate waste from soda ash production. After dewatering, suitable for pH adjustment, water treatment, or filler material.
Spent barley and grain from beer brewing process. High protein and fiber content, excellent for animal feed, composting, or biofuel production.
Mixed hydrocarbon solvents from polymer production cleaning. Suitable for solvent recovery, fuel blending, or industrial cleaning applications.

material_needs.description: Seeking post-industrial plastic waste for recycling operations. Can process mixed plastics into recycled resin pellets for manufacturing.
Seeking high-energy waste materials as alternative fuel for cement kilns. Can utilize petroleum coke, plastics, tires, biomass, and other combustibles.
Industrial composting facility seeking diverse organic waste streams. Can process food waste, spent grains, agricultural waste, and biosolids into compost.
Seeking recovered industrial solvents for use in chemical synthesis. Can utilize spent solvents from pharmaceutical, coatings, and manufacturing operations.

waste_stream.description: Alkaline sludge from chlor-alkali and ethylene production. High sodium content suitable for pH adjustment, water treatment, or neutralization processes.
Spent catalyst filter cake from chemical synthesis. Contains recoverable metals and alumina suitable for catalyst regeneration or metal recovery.
High-purity elemental sulfur recovered from hydrodesulfurization. Valuable for fertilizer production, sulfuric acid manufacturing, and chemical synthesis.
Mixed food waste from distribution center operations. Includes expired produce, bakery items, and unsaleable food products suitable for composting or anaerobic digestion.

material_needs.description: Processing facility seeking diverse industrial waste streams for material recovery and recycling operations.
Biofuel production facility seeking organic waste streams for conversion into renewable energy and biofuels.
